#syn-hero-title: P&G's AI Evolution
#syn-hero-text: P&G's commitment to AI adoption requires a strategic approach to upskilling. LHH empowers your workforce with the digital competencies needed to drive innovation across R&D, supply chain, and marketing.
#syn-item1-text: Our AI for all training series delivers expert-led, hands-on learning to empower teams at every level. We've helped 3000+ employees at leading companies use AI responsibly to boost productivity, automate workflows, and drive transformation with AI-powered strategy.
#syn-item2-text: Our tech upskilling programs transform employees into high-performing digital talent. We take people with minimal technical experience and equip them with data analytics and digital transformation skills through purpose-built training aligned with your innovation goals.
#syn-item3-text: World-class digital coaching through EZRA reinforces learning and sustains behavior change. Our coaching approach ensures your teams maximize the adoption of AI and digital tools, driving cultural buy-in for digital transformation.
#syn-form-text: LHH partners with P&G to support your workforce transformation: offering empathetic career transition coaching, targeted internal mobility programs, and professional staffing solutions. We preserve your employer brand, maintain engagement, and ensure seamless business continuity every step of the way.
#syn-casestudy-subtitle: Learn how we combined external hiring and internal reskilling to deliver digital transformation, achieving strong results in tech upskilling and redeployment.
#syn-quote-text: I came away learning a ton, and more importantly applying those new skills. I also feel comfortable learning new frameworks and languages as I go since the class taught us how to troubleshoot and keep learning. Overall, I loved it! Time well spent!
